com.logituit.logixsdk.logixplayer.interfaces

Interface LogixPlayerEventListener


  • public interface LogixPlayerEventListener
    This is an interface for event player listener for the events occuring on LogixPlayerView

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LogixPlayerEventListener.LogixEventTime
      Time information of an event.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STATE_BUFFERING
      The player is not able to immediately play from its current position.
      static int STATE_ENDED
      The player has finished playing the media.
      static int STATE_IDLE
      The player does not have any media to play.
      static int STATE_READY
      The player is able to immediately play from its current position.

    • Field Detail

      • STATE_IDLE

        static final int STATE_IDLE
        The player does not have any media to play.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATE_BUFFERING

        static final int STATE_BUFFERING
        The player is not able to immediately play from its current position. This state typically occurs when more data needs to be loaded.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATE_READY

        static final int STATE_READY
        The player is able to immediately play from its current position. The player will be playing if #getPlayWhenReady() is true, and paused otherwise.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATE_ENDED

        static final int STATE_ENDED
        The player has finished playing the media.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • onVisibilityChange

        void onVisibilityChange(int visibility)
        This method is called when visibility of the view has changed
        Parameters:
        visibility - is integer parameter denoting status of visibility

      • onPlayerStateChanged

        void onPlayerStateChanged(boolean playWhenReady,
                          int playbackState)
        This method is called when the state of the player is changed i.e the parameter playWhenReady or playbackState is changed
        Parameters:
        playWhenReady - boolean parameter telling whether to play the video after buffering(true) or not(false)
        playbackState - can be from STATE_IDLE or STATE_BUFFERING or STATE_READY or STATE_ENDED

      • onTracksChanged

        void onTracksChanged()
        This method is called when the current playing video track is changed

      • onPlayNext

        void onPlayNext()
        This method is called when the next video in the current playlist is to be played

      • onPlayPrevious

        void onPlayPrevious()
        This method is called when the previous video in the current playlist is to be played

      • onEnterFullscreen

        void onEnterFullscreen()
        This method is called when orientation for the video player is changed from portrait to landscape mode full screen i.e landscape mode is set for the video player

      • onExitFullscreen

        void onExitFullscreen()
        This method is called when orientation for the video player is changed from landscape to portrait mode user exits from the full screen i.e landscape mode to the change the orientation to portrait mode

      • onShowControls

        void onShowControls()
        This method is called when the play back controls of the video player view are to be shown

      • onHideControls

        void onHideControls()
        This method is called when the play back controls of the video player view are to be hidden

      • onPlayerInitialized

        void onPlayerInitialized()
        This method is called while initializing the video player SimpleExoPlayer

        void onLiveButtonClicked()
        This method is called when the live button is clicked //TODO

      • onSeekProcessed

        void onSeekProcessed()
        This method is called when the seek action on the currently playing video is finished

      • onLoadingChanged

        void onLoadingChanged(boolean isLoading)
        This method is called when the loading of media source for video in the LogixPlayerView player stops or starts
        Parameters:
        isLoading - boolean parameter indicating whether the player is loading the media source for the video or not

      • onPlayerError

        void onPlayerError(boolean isBehindLiveWindow,
                   LogixPlaybackException logixPlaybackEx)
        Called when an error occurs. The playback state will transition to STATE_IDLE immediately after this method is called. The player instance can still be used, and LogixPlayerImpl.releasePlayer() must still be called on the player should it no longer be required.
        Parameters:
        isBehindLiveWindow - when a live playback falls behind the available media window.
        logixPlaybackEx - object of LogixPlaybackException

      • onVideoParamsSet

        void onVideoParamsSet(VideoResolution videoResolution)
        This method is called when video parameters in the form of android.provider.MediaStore.Video are changed
        Parameters:
        videoResolution - A VideoResolution

      • showMessage

        void showMessage(int msgId)
        Intimate parent activity about non-player issues.
        Parameters:
        msgId - messageIds corresponding with Error variables in C

      • onVideoBitrateChanged

        void onVideoBitrateChanged(VideoResolution videoResolution)
        This method is called when the bitrate for currently playing video is changed
        Parameters:
        videoResolution - A VideoResolution

      • onPlaylistItemEnded

        void onPlaylistItemEnded(int index)
        This method is called when positional discontinuity occurs due to item in the playlist has ended //TODO

        index - //TODO

        void onPlaylistNext()
        This method is called when next item playlist is to be played //TODO

        void onPlaylistPrevious()
        This method is called when previous item playlist is to be played //TODO

      • onPlayListEnded

        void onPlayListEnded()
        This method is called when the playlist has finished playing the media i.e. all the videos in the playlist

      • onRenderedFirstFrame

        void onRenderedFirstFrame(LogixPlayerEventListener.LogixEventTime eventTime,
                          @Nullable
                          android.view.Surface surface)
        Called when a frame is rendered for the first time since setting the surface, and when a frame is rendered for the first time since the renderer was reset.
        Parameters:
        eventTime - The event time.
        surface - The Surface to which a first frame has been rendered, or null if the renderer renders to something that isn't a Surface.

      • onDroppedVideoFrames

        void onDroppedVideoFrames(LogixPlayerEventListener.LogixEventTime eventTime,
                          int droppedFrames,
                          long elapsedMs)
        Called after video frames have been dropped.
        Parameters:
        eventTime - The event time.
        droppedFrames - The number of dropped frames since the last call to this method.
        elapsedMs - The duration in milliseconds over which the frames were dropped. This duration is timed from when the renderer was started or from when dropped frames were last reported (whichever was more recent), and not from when the first of the reported drops occurred.
